values: 根据；按照；在…项下；在…下面；到…下面；通过…下面；用（某一名字）；在…过程中；不足；小于；少于；比…年轻；由…控制；由…管理；由…经营；在…表面下；由…造成；由…覆盖着
在下方；在底下；在水下；在地下；在较低的位置；在较低级别；小于；少于；处于受控状态；在麻醉作用下

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 后进生；学校学习成绩低于智商的学生
出价低于…；出较低的价钱

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，与over相对，指在某物的正下方，含垂直在下的意思。
指位置低于某物或在某物下方，但不一定在正下方，所指范围较宽。
书面口语均用，也常与beneath和under换用，但更含遮蔽的意味。
书面用词，指紧挨……之下，其反义词是on。

word_group.brief_definition: (液体或气体)受压力；压缩；在(心理)压力下
已经开始, 在进行中
同一屋檐下；(住)在一起；家和万事兴
受酒精饮料影响的, 喝醉的
被归为；受影响；受支配；受管辖；遭受

bilingual.source: Short u up jump jumper run runner under much minibus
bilingual.target: 向上跳跃跳跃的人跑赛跑者，操作者在…下面许多的小公共汽车

list.abstract: 英文单词，读音： ['ʌndə]注释：prep. 低于，少于；在·..之下adv. 在下面；在下方adj. 下面的；从属的

yingyinNormal.en: I am King Under the Mountain.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我才是山下之王。

yingyinNormal.en: Which we're still keeping under our hats.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还不只是那些。

yingyinNormal.en: You've salted away every fact under the sun!
yingyinNormal.zh: 天下的知识你都存着。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean that thing is under water? Yes. Yes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说那东西在水下？是的。是的。

yingyinNormal.en: Why would he do that? Petrov got under his skin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他为什么要那么做？佩特罗夫把他气到了。

yingyinNormal.en: Everywhere. Under rocks. In holes in the ground.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到处都是，岩石下，地洞里。

yingyinNormal.en: Sidao will never be a subject under the Khanate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 贾似道绝不会臣服于汗国的。

yingyinNormal.en: To celebrate your 30 under 30 thing. Right, Sheldon?
yingyinNormal.zh: 庆祝一下你的大器早成，对吧，谢尔顿？

yingyinNormal.en: Shredder will force this city to live under our rule.
yingyinNormal.zh: 施莱德会强迫这座城市在我们的规矩下生活。

yingyinNormal.en: The tarts are under your bed. Don't blame your sister.
yingyinNormal.zh: 果塔是在你的床底下，别怪在妹妹头上。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《爱丽丝梦游仙境2：镜中奇遇记》

yingyinNormal.en: Actually, I think they're registered under both names.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我觉得，他们会联名注册。

yingyinNormal.en: It's unfortunate that we meet under these circumstances.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很不幸，在这种情况下与你们相识。

yingyinNormal.en: Where would the master-at-arms take someone under arrest?
yingyinNormal.zh: 被逮捕的人会被带到哪?

yingyinNormal.en: The keys aren't just laying around under a rock somewhere.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些钥匙可不是藏在石头底下这么简单。

yingyinNormal.en: And therefore, subsume your conclusions under my paradigm.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此，你的结论也得纳入我的范式。

yingyinNormal.en: What's that? You're under our control. Well, their control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么？你处于我们的控制之下，准确地说，是他们的控制之下。

yingyinNormal.en: Only use firecrackers or fireworks under close supervision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意：只在封闭的监管地区燃放烟花爆竹。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, Slick-Nick. You're under arrest. Really? For what?
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，狡猾的尼克，你被捕了。真的吗？为什么？

yingyinNormal.en: What's going on? Nothing, nothing. Everything's under control.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么了？ 没事，一切都在掌握中。

yingyinNormal.en: I'd use Feynman's trick, differentiate under the integral sign. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我会用费曼的秘诀积分，符合内取微分。不错嘛。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 承受着; 在...重压下; 处(在)于...情况下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 承受着; 在...重压下; 处(在)于...情况下

examination_example.sentence: New research on transportation biofuels is already <highlight>under</highlight> way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运输生物燃料的新研究已经在进行中。

examination_example.sentence: Any guaranteed bonus of top executives could be delayed 10 years if their banks are <highlight>under</highlight> investigation for wrongdoing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果高管所在的银行因不当行为接受调查，那么他们的任何保证奖金都可能被推迟10年。

examination_example.sentence: But many within the public sector suffer <highlight>under</highlight> the current system, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在当前的体制下，公共部门的许多人也深受其害。

examination_example.sentence: Ms Denham chose to concentrate the blame on the NHS trust, since <highlight>under</highlight> existing law it "controlled" the data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Denham女士选择将责任集中在国民保健署信托上，因为根据现行法律，它“控制”数据。

examination_example.sentence: But <highlight>under</highlight> anti-bribery laws, proof must be made of concrete benefits, such as approval of a contract or regulation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是根据反贿赂法的规定，必须提供具体利益的证明，例如批准某项合同或法规。

examination_example.sentence: A recent study attempts to separate them by looking at bribery prosecutions <highlight>under</highlight> America's Foreign Corrupt Practices Act.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究试图通过研究美国《反海外腐败法》下的贿赂起诉来区分它们。

examination_example.sentence: That's about as effective as brushing dirt <highlight>under</highlight> a carpet and can even make us ill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就像在地毯下刷灰尘一样有效，甚至会让我们生病。

examination_example.sentence: In March, the California Attorney General announced the approval of additional regulations <highlight>under</highlight> the California Consumer Privacy Act.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 3月，加州司法部长宣布批准《加州消费者隐私法》下的其他法规。

examination_example.sentence: The additional regulations <highlight>under</highlight> the CCPA are intended to protect consumers from being tricked.
examination_example.sentence_trans: CCPA的附加规定旨在保护消费者免受欺骗。

examination_example.sentence: The Information commissioner, Elizabeth Denham, has issued her damning verdict against the Royal Free hospital trust <highlight>under</highlight> the NHS.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 信息专员Elizabeth Denham对国家健康署下的皇家免费医院信托作出了定罪裁决。

examination_example.sentence: From then on his sketches, which appeared <highlight>under</highlight> the pen name "Boz" in The Evening Chronicle, earned him a modest reputation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在那之后，他以“博兹”为笔名在《晚间纪事》上发表短篇小说，为他赢得了一定的赞誉。

examination_example.sentence: Employment protection laws constrain business owners from dismissing <highlight>under</highlight>-performing managers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就业保护法限制企业主解雇表现不佳的经理。

sense_info_list.en: used to express dominance or control

word_usage.usage:
表示“在……下面”
under指某物在另一物的下面或底下，两者之间有无一定距离均可。
below指某物所处的位置低于另一物。指所处位置时，beneath与 under, below 基本同义，但有时强调在某物的正下方，而且较富有文学性。
underneath与 under 的意思相近，但含有将某物隐藏或遮盖起来之意。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 同一屋檐下；(住)在一起；家和万事兴

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Make sure they are brought <highlight>under</highlight> control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确保他们处于控制之下。

examination_example.sentence: If imported merchandise is unused and destroyed <highlight>under</highlight> their supervision, 99% of the duties may be recovered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果进口商品在其监管下未被使用和销毁，99%的关税可能会被追回。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> Christopher Bailey as creative director they turned the brand around and this past year revenue hit £2.73 billion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在创意总监克里斯托弗·贝利(Christopher Bailey)的带领下，他们扭转了品牌，去年的收入达到27.3亿英镑。

word_usage.usage:
under还可以表示所处的状况、条件或在进行的过程中。
under control 处于控制之下
under way 在进行中

exam_freq_info.chinese: 承受着; 在...重压下; 处(在)于...情况下

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 承受着; 在...重压下; 处(在)于...情况下

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>under</highlight> too much stress counselling needy students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为给有需要的学生提供咨询，他们承受了太大的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Crews had the fire <highlight>under</highlight> control in about 45 minutes and managed to contain the fire to its point of origin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全体工作人员在大约45分钟内控制住了火势，并设法将火势控制在它的源头。

examination_example.sentence: They are <highlight>under</highlight> growing pressure to balance their national budgets.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们在平衡国家预算方面面临着越来越大的的压力。

examination_example.sentence: Then a good luck charm that he had kept <highlight>under</highlight> his bed changed his life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，他放在床下的一个幸运物改变了他的生活。

examination_example.sentence: He was trapped <highlight>under</highlight> a beam about ten feet below the surface for nearly an hour and a half.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他被困在离水面约10英尺的一根横梁下近一个半小时。

examination_example.sentence: New research has found deep water reserves <highlight>under</highlight> the state which could help solve their drought crisis.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新的研究发现该州地下有深层水储量，可以帮助解决他们的干旱危机。

examination_example.sentence: Meanwhile, time spent playing video games rose from <highlight>under</highlight> an hour a day to an hour and a half on average.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与此同时，玩电子游戏的时间从每天不到一个小时增加到平均一个半小时。

examination_example.sentence: Although women make up the majority of undergraduates in our universities, just <highlight>under</highlight> half of academic staff are female.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然女性占我国大学本科生的大多数，但只有不到一半的教职员工是女性。

examination_example.sentence: Agents and fashion houses who hire models with a BMI <highlight>under</highlight> 18 could pay $82, 000 in fines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 雇佣体重指数低于18的模特的经纪人和时装公司可能会支付82000美元的罚款。

examination_example.sentence: As many office workers adapt to remote work, cities may undergo fundamental change if offices remain <highlight>under</highlight>-utilized.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着许多上班族适应了远程工作，如果办公室仍未得到充分利用，城市可能会发生根本性的变化。

examination_example.sentence: This is especially important for <highlight>under</highlight>-resourced schools and communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对资源不足的学校和社区尤为重要。

examination_example.sentence: We found reliable evidence that people were drastically <highlight>under</highlight>-reporting what they ate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们发现了可靠的证据，证明人们严重低估了自己的饮食。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> the old system in America, a mother was supposed to stay home and take care of her children.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在美国古老的制度下，母亲应该呆在家里照顾孩子。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> international treaties, the U. S. is responsible for the cargo of both public and private spacecraft.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据国际条约，美国对公共和私人航天器的货物负责。

examination_example.sentence: What do tobacco companies have to do <highlight>under</highlight> the law in Massachusetts?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据马萨诸塞州的法律，烟草公司必须做什么？

examination_example.sentence: But the most cutting-edge tool <highlight>under</highlight> development is the "teachable agent".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但正在开发的最前沿工具是“可教代理”。

examination_example.sentence: It is a teaching tool <highlight>under</highlight> development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是一种正在开发的教学工具。

sense_info_list.en: used to express dominance or control

examination_example.sentence: The Internet remained <highlight>under</highlight> government control until 1984.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 直到1984年，互联网仍由政府控制。

examination_example.sentence: Starting last Saturday, chains big enough to fall <highlight>under</highlight> the rule will face penalties of up to 2, 000 dollars.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从上周六开始，受该规定限制的大型连锁餐厅将面临最高2000美元的罚款。

word_usage.usage:
under还可以表示所处的状况、条件或在进行的过程中。
under control 处于控制之下
under way 在进行中

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: The solar still works by creating a greenhouse <highlight>under</highlight> the plastic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 太阳能依然起作用——通过在塑料下制造温室。

examination_example.sentence: Large outdoor theater with the closest seats <highlight>under</highlight> cover (price difference).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大型户外影院，最近的座位上有遮盖（价格差异）。

examination_example.sentence: One more look and he noticed flames shooting out from <highlight>under</highlight> the disabled vehicle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 再看一眼，他就注意到火焰从那辆残障的车下面冒了出来。

examination_example.sentence: Go to the government website to learn about programs and online tools available to help people <highlight>under</highlight> 30 build skills all year round.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 访问政府网站，了解一整年期间可以帮助30岁以下的人培养技能的项目和在线工具。

examination_example.sentence: Matt Tebbutt offers top tips on how to reduce food waste, while preparing recipes for <highlight>under</highlight> £5 per family a day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Matt Tebbutt提供了如何减少食物浪费的顶级建议，同时为每个家庭准备了每天5英镑以下的食谱。

examination_example.sentence: They customers pay just <highlight>under</highlight> $2 (plus drinks) per session.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的顾客每次只付不到2美元（外加饮料）。

examination_example.sentence: The project was inspired by a French team where examinations are done <highlight>under</highlight> hypnosis instead of general anesthesia (麻醉).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该项目的灵感来自一个法国团队，他们在催眠状态下进行检查，而不是全身麻醉。

examination_example.sentence: For example, Russian, French, and Spanish persons may use silence to show agreement between parties about the topic <highlight>under</highlight> discussion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，俄罗斯人、法国人和西班牙人可能会使用沉默来表示双方就讨论的话题达成一致。

examination_example.sentence: And you'd be working <highlight>under</highlight> Monica Stansfield, the department manager.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会在部门经理Monica Stansfield手下工作。

examination_example.sentence: They've recently come <highlight>under</highlight> fire because most people don't need them to drink with.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为大多数人不需要它们来喝酒，它们最近受到了攻击。

examination_example.sentence: When a leafy plant is <highlight>under</highlight> attack, it doesn't sit quietly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当多叶植物受到攻击时，它不会安静地呆着。

examination_example.sentence: Many of the images were stored in an ice chest, <highlight>under</highlight> freezing water, in the damaged wooden ship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多照片被保存在冰水中一艘破损木船的冰柜里。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> this Act, all waterfowl hunters 16 years of age and over must annually purchase and carry a Federal Duck Stamp.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据这项法案，所有16岁及以上的水禽猎人必须每年购买并持有一枚联邦鸭票。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: (液体或气体)受压力；压缩；在(心理)压力下

examination_example.sentence: They have very different parts <highlight>under</highlight> their hoods.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的引擎盖下有非常不同的部分。

examination_example.sentence: They use special tools to be able to breathe <highlight>under</highlight> the water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使用特殊工具在水下呼吸。

examination_example.sentence: In the beginning, when a cicada is <highlight>under</highlight> the ground, it is called a baby cicada.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 起初，当一只蝉在地下时，它被称为婴儿蝉。

examination_example.sentence: It's wrong and dangerous to leave children <highlight>under</highlight> a certain age alone in the house.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把不满一定年龄的孩子单独留在家里是错误和危险的。

examination_example.sentence: According to the traffic law, children <highlight>under</highlight> 12 mustn't ride bicycles on the road ．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据交通法规，12 岁以下的儿童不得在马路上骑自行车。

examination_example.sentence: There is no lowest wage(工资) for children <highlight>under</highlight> 16.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 16岁以下的儿童没有最低工资。

examination_example.sentence: Hundreds of companies have closed their factories until the disease is more <highlight>under</highlight> control.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 数百家公司已经关闭了他们的工厂，直到疫情得到进一步控制。

examination_example.sentence: The students, mostly from one-child families, were taught to be a good child <highlight>under</highlight> strict rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些学生大多来自独生子女家庭，受制于严格的规定下被教导要成为一个好孩子。

examination_example.sentence: We're looking for polite and patient people who can work <highlight>under</highlight> pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正在寻找能够在压力下工作的有礼貌和耐心的人。

examination_example.sentence: Today's kids are <highlight>under</highlight> great pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在的孩子压力很大。

examination_example.sentence: Some students are <highlight>under</highlight> too much pressure.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些学生压力太大了。

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>under</highlight> the cosh.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我疲于防守。

examination_example.sentence: So when people say "I'm <highlight>under</highlight> the weather," they are saying that they're not feeling well.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所以当人们说“I'm under the weather”时，他们是在说他们感觉不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: I'm <highlight>under</highlight> the weather
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我身体不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: What is the writer's advice when you come to an expression like <highlight>under</highlight> the weather?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当你谈到像我不舒服这样的表达时，作者的建议是什么？

examination_example.sentence: With the Civil Code, China hopes to set up a country <highlight>under</highlight> the rule of law with better protection for civil rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国希望通过《民法典》建立一个法治国家，来更好地保障公民权利。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> such a rule, students still have some freedom, and they learn how to improve self-discipline and live with new technologies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这样的规则下，学生仍然有一些自由，他们学习如何提高自律性，并且适应新的技术。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Under</highlight> these great reforms, Qin grew stronger and stronger.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这些大改革的过程中，秦国越来越强大。

word_usage.usage:
under还可以表示所处的状况、条件或在进行的过程中。
under control 处于控制之下
under way 在进行中
